hadiths.text: Narrated One of the Wives of the Prophet: Ikrimah reported on the authority of one of the wives of the Prophet (ﷺ) saying: When the Prophet (ﷺ) wanted to do something (i.e. kissing, embracing) with (his) menstruating wife, he would put a garment on her private part

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصِيبُ مِنْهَا مَا دُونَ الْجِمَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: A Person Has Relations With Her Other Than Intercourse
